description: Cypress test suite for TodoMVC application, implementing end-to-end tests covering core functionalities, routing, and persistence, with framework-specific configurations and known issues handling.

methods.name: skipTestsWithKnownIssues
methods.description: Filters out tests with known issues based on framework and knownIssues list.

methods.name: checkTodosInLocalStorage
methods.description: Verifies presence of specific todo text in localStorage.

methods.name: checkCompletedKeywordInLocalStorage
methods.description: Checks for any completed items in localStorage.

methods.name: checkNumberOfTodosInLocalStorage
methods.description: Ensures localStorage contains a specific number of todo items.

methods.name: checkNumberOfCompletedTodosInLocalStorage
methods.description: Verifies the count of completed todo items in localStorage.
